(440) (321) 676-9995 Categories Seafood, Steakhouses, Music Venues Location 4845 Dixie Hwy NE, Palm Bay, FL Gift Tips Try the stuffed flounder for a delicious seafood dish that's highly recommended. Ask for server Kim when you visit; guests consistently appreciate her attentive and friendly service. Enjoy your meal from the outdoor deck railing to see dolphins and jumping fish in the bay. End your meal with the crème brûlée cheesecake, a popular dessert choice. Consider bringing your dog, as they feature a special 'Dog Pound Menu' for furry guests. Click here to send a gift up to $1,000 with the suggestion to use it at The Shack Riverfront Restaurant & Outback Tiki bar!. Is this your business? Claim your business to update business information, customize this listing, and more! Learn more about The Shack Riverfront Restaurant & Outback Tiki bar! Price $$ Ambience Casual Year Established 2009 Hours Monday-Thursday, Sunday: 11AM-11PM Friday-Saturday: 11AM-12AM The Shack Riverfront Restaurant & Outback Tiki bar is a charming dining spot located along the scenic shoreline of the Indian River lagoon in Palm Bay, Florida. Family-owned and operated since 1972, it offers a friendly environment to enjoy quality food and stunning views. Ambiance : Relaxed and casual atmosphere with beautiful riverfront views. Cuisine : Delicious fresh seafood, steaks, and diverse dishes from tacos to crab legs. Highlights : Live music performances every Thursday through Sunday. Guests can savor a wide variety of menu items, from locally-sourced seafood dishes to expertly prepared steaks and comfort-food favorites. Dining is made even more enjoyable with seating options that let you take advantage of waterfront scenery. The Shack is also recognized for its dedication to hospitality, with attentive and knowledgeable service making every dining experience special. Whether you're visiting for a meal with family, friends, or even your pet, The Shack provides an inviting spot for any occasion. Customer Reviews Jane I. 06/04/2025 We have been there 3 times in the past 2 months.  Each time the food was amazing!! Unfortunately, twice the entertainment was SO loud, we could not even... read review John S. 08/24/2025 I went here for a late lunch, I had the Shrimp and chips. It was very good. Then for dessert, I had the best Key Lime pie that I ever had. I guess it's made... read review Lena B. 02/02/2025 Experience: met a friend here for a quick drink on a Sunday at 2:00 pm. 

Facility: cute place on the water.
